positions.subtitle: Vahura
positions.description: We help channelize insight and expertise into Indian legal market intelligence. We help law firms and corporate legal departments within enterprises, high-growth organizations, and funds, on strategic transformations and develop an acute understanding of the Indian legal industry.
positions.title: Senior Consultant at Vahura | Consulting

positions.subtitle: Vahura
positions.description: In my current role, I work closely with legal departments, enabling them to improve their overall efficiency and become value-adding strategic partners to the business. This involves conducting legal ops audits, visualizing process optimizations, selecting and implementing the right legal tech solutions, providing market intelligence, and delivering benchmarking reports, among other strategic business requirements.

experience.title: Consultant at Vahura | Consulting
experience.description: We help organizations lead the Indian legal, tax, governance, and compliance sectors into the future by providing strategic consulting services to help them grow and deliver superior value. Please visit www.vahura.com for more information.
experience.description_html: We help organizations lead the Indian legal, tax, governance, and compliance sectors into the future by providing strategic consulting services to help them grow and deliver superior value. Please visit www.vahura.com for more information. <!---->

experience.title: Associate
experience.description: Zarah practices intellectual property law with a focus on Trademarks, Copyrights and Designs. She graduated from ILS Law College, Pune and thereafter joined Selvam and Selvam in 2016. Zarah has developed extensive experience in advising clients on strategies to develop, protect and enforce their trademark rights as well as registering and enforcing copyrights. She has effectively provided legal advice in all aspects of intellectual property to an array of clientèle ranging from start-ups to multi-national corporations alike.During her tenure at the firm, Zarah has worked in depth on various sectors of intellectual property namely trademarks, copyrights, designs and domain disputes including but not limited to prosecution, enforcement and IP transactions such as licensing and transfers of Copyrights, Designs, Trademarks and Domains. She has also represented various clients on opposition and cancellation/revocation proceedings before the Trademark Office and the Intellectual Property Appellate Board.Zarah is often appreciated by her clients for being proactive in protecting their rights, providing regular reviews of their portfolios and for providing practical business advice adding value to their businesses. She has successfully represented a broad range of clients in a variety of industries including FMCG, pharmaceuticals, sports, technology, media and on-line businesses.
